code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product,addToCart}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/product/${product.id}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"price",style:{fontWeight:'bold',color:'#ff5722',fontSize:'1.5rem'},children:[product.price," \u20BD"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"\u0414\u043E\u0431\u0430\u0432\u0438\u0442\u044C \u0432 \u043A\u043E\u0440\u0437\u0438\u043D\u0443"})]});};export default ProductCard;
